text.section: In this section, "Group" means the Consensus Revenue Monitoring and Forecasting Group established under this section.
There is a Consensus Revenue Monitoring and Forecasting Group.
The Chief shall chair the Group.

The Group and its constituent units shall:
review and analyze attainment of revenues on a monthly basis; and
advise and collaborate with the Bureau:
in the development of revenue forecasts and any necessary revisions to those forecasts; and
in the performance of any pertinent studies or analyses as requested by the Chief or as directed by the Board.

To assist the Group in performing its function, the Comptroller and the Bureau shall:
within 7 calendar days after the end of each month, provide to members of the Group detailed data on revenue collections; and
before any document relating to the work of the Bureau is published, provide a draft of the document to the members of the Group for review and comment.
